message: Let's make this quick. 900k for me, 100k for you.
My turn. I'm feeling generous. 700k for me, 300k for you. This is a good deal considering the inflation.
Don't be greedy, Bob. This is my final offer.
Let's be fair, Alice. A 50/50 split is the most logical outcome. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
